function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Living in an apartment during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to close proximity and shared spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, limit shared spaces, and promote ventilation.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, contactless systems, and ventilation systems.","People":"Residents of apartments, building management, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities."}]}
